page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS:WOODTON AREA
page.content: A wide range of crafts & hobbies gives pleasure to many.Mothers make soft toys for their children,later their interest & skill find a financial outlet at W.I.Market or Craft Fair.One very artistic individual creates collage pictures & church embroidery; another specialises in soft furnishings;others make church kneelers or are gifted dressmakers. There are those who are skilled in cooking & catering,who can ice a fine wedding cake,while many bake their own bread. The more masculine metalcrafts are found in an engineering workshop & ability in woodwork has produced splendid dolls' houses. A Garden Club holds 3 shows & competitions each year.These are fully supported:great pride is taken,both in flower gardens & vegetable plots.
